original_title: Myth Makers 18: Doctor Who Magazine, Vol. 1
overview: Intrepid Nicholas Briggs delves into Doctor Who Magazineâ€™s past, studies its production and looks to the future.  Along the way he talks to editor John Freeman, artists John Ridgway and Lee Sullivan, long term contributor Gary Russell and many more.  This is a fascinating look at a unique publication in its 10th year, covering every aspect of its production and development.
title: Myth Makers 18: Doctor Who Magazine, Vol. 1
